author: newsr.in
title: Sam Smith Reveals James Bond Theme 'Writing’s on the Wall' Music Video - Watch Now!
text: Sam Smith‘s brand new music video for “Writing’s on the Wall,” which is the theme song for the James Bond film Spectre, has just landed on the web. The video was directed by Luke Monaghan. It was filming in various spots throughout Rome, Italy, where Spectre was also filmed. The video contains images of Sam [...] »
